description:
Protect yourself when you're out enjoying the sun. This easy to apply lotion rubs in clear and provides long lasting, sweat and water-resistant protection. Using a 20% micronized zinc oxide formula Thinksport’s Clear Zinc Oxide sunscreen helps keep you safe from UVA and UVB rays.

  • Broad spectrum UVA and UVB protection
  • Free of hormone disrupting chemicals. No oxybenzone
  • Contains zinc oxide that has been micronized for easy application and absorption
  • Rated water resistant (80 minutes), the highest possible water resistance rating
  • Active ingredient: zinc oxide 20% (non-nano)
  • Inactive ingredients: purified water, caprylic/capric triglyceride, polyglyceryl-4 isostearate, glycerin, hydrogenated glyceryl abietate, hexyl laurate, cetyl dimethicone, aloe barbadensis leaf juice, hydrogenated castor oil, magnesium sulfate, sunflower seed oil, jojoba seed oil, tocopherol, olive fruit oil, raspberry seed oil, cranberry seed oil, sodium hyaluronate, papaya fruit extract, black currant extract, pink grapefruit peel oil, sorbitan sesquioleate, caprylhydroxamic acid, triethoxycaprylylsilane, glyceryl caprylate
name: Thinksport Clear Zinc Sunscreen SPF 50+ 3oz
